title: [Placements] Deloitte is offering FTE+Intern or its just FTE for all roles?
content:
Deloitte if offering FTE+Intern or its just FTE for all roles?  
in the placement sheet 2026 , they updated it as only FTE , is this only FTE?

comments.body: Have they rolled out offer letter?
cud be, yes. Check the email from PESU placements, it will mention
For deloitte USI, only fte. Deloitte india, fte+ intern
